What did the bird first think the world was made of?
Why did the couple start quarrelling?

one_liners.question: What did the bird learn after flying beyond the tree?
one_liners.answer: The bird realised the world was bigger than it imagined.

one_liners.question: What was Gopal Bhand trying to teach the couple?
one_liners.answer: He warned them against fighting over imaginary things.

one_liners.question: Name one habit of a good listener.
one_liners.answer: A good listener pays close attention to the speaker.

one_liners.question: Which strawberries are plump and juicy?
one_liners.answer: Strawberries grown in gardens are plump and juicy.

one_liners.question: Why was Marouckla sent into the forest?
one_liners.answer: She was forced to fetch things impossible in winter.

one_liners.question: Where are written announcements usually displayed?
one_liners.answer: Written announcements are put on notice boards.

one_liners.question: Which day is celebrated as National Sports Day?
one_liners.answer: 29th August is celebrated as National Sports Day.

one_liners.answer: To avoid hurting anyone’s feelings.
